name: Ball
desc: Soccer ball has a machine-stitched body with nylon and TPU materials for a soft touch.

name: Shoes
desc: The premium synthetic leather has a 3-D texture on key areas to provide targeted friction and a precise touch.

name: Shirt
desc: Training Shirt features team details on soft sweat-wicking fabric to help keep you dry and comfortable during your workout.

name: Stick
desc: Tough rigid 47" stick specially designed to take the force of rugged play.

name: Puck
desc: A must have for every Wisconsin Badgers hockey fan!

name: Helmet
desc: Hockey helmet that features the Suspend-Tech 2 liner system with FleXorb Technology for superior impact absorption and better rotational management.

name: Racket
desc: Table Tennis Racket consists of competition-style rubber with 1.6 mm sponge for precise control spin and speed.

name: Table
desc: Table Tennis Table boasts a responsive 5/8"" surface so you can make impressive side spins smashes and forehand drives.
